labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The mute tick-box only displays in a server's voice channel
data.expected_result: The mute tick-box displays in all instances of the context menu
data.short_description: Cannot toggle personal mute in DMs
data.steps_to_repro: - Mute (or unmute) user in a server's voice channel - Join a DM call with the user - Right-click user profile to show context menu - The mute tick-box is missing
